column4: what's wrong with openvpn? i've got little experience with it, but i was never unhappy with it...?
i wasn't aware of that LOL. been years since i used it or even looked at it
so, i wouldn't. good to know, b/c i was actually considering it for a project awhile back...
hey, humanMeat, are you good with bluetooth in meerkat?
i haven't either, and i'm stuck...
anyone else in here good with bluetooth in 10.10?
i didnt  even know bluetooth works with linux
i've managed to get my s305's paired, but i can't pipe audio into the headphones
oh yeah, ive been down linux audio hell a few times... i dont envy you
:-)    i'm not quite there yet, maybe purgatory
i did notice ubuntu audio got way better with 10.04 over the previous releases though.. im hoping its not something i need to worry about anymore
i sure hope so. i'd love to figure out how to get some headphones working. would make going to work a lot more enjoyable
if it helps, ive had much better luck with logitech usb headphones, than with analog 1/8" headphones with ubuntu
that might be something to look into... i've been using analog for awhile now, and i'd like to cut the cord, and go wireless
yeah, ive never had luck with the analog headphones on my ubuntu machines.. the logitech usb support is really good though
of course it depends on the sound card
